description: Sometimes life just calls for a bitch slap. Bradly and Caden had a tiff and Caden ended up showing Bradley the back of his hand, Bradly showed caden the front of his and trouble ensued, it turned into what looked like one of those fights you see on the baseball field. Amid the tussle there tongues became intertwined and one thing led to another. Needless to say it was no longer Bradlys first time.
title: Hold Me Tight
